sentences.sentence: "Leigh," he said seizing my arm to hold me back.
sentences.translation: “莉，”他说着便抓住我的胳膊把我拉了回来。

sentences.sentence: "Pirates," cried John, seizing his Sunday hat, "let us go at once."
sentences.translation: “海盗，”约翰叫道，抓起他周日帽，“让我们马上去吧。”

sentences.sentence: Heidi seizing his arm, shouted, full of indignation, "You mustn't hurt him!"
sentences.translation: 海蒂抓住他的胳膊，义愤填膺地喊道：“你不能伤害他！”
